verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> again to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

And <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H1121>Ammonites,<s%> <S%H5984><s%> <S%H8085>Hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H3282>Because<s%> you <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H253>Aha,<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> my <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> it was <S%H2490>profaned;<s%> and <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> it was <S%H8074>desolate;<s%> and <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> they went into <S%H1473>captivity;<s%>

<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> <S%H3651>therefore<s%> I will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> you to the <S%H1121>men<s%> of the <S%H6924>east<s%> for a <S%H4181>possession,<s%> and they shall <S%H3427>set<s%> their <S%H2918>palaces<s%> in you, and <S%H5414>make<s%> their <S%H4908>dwellings<s%> in you: they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> your <S%H6529>fruit,<s%> and they shall <S%H8354>drink<s%> your <S%H2461>milk.<s%>

And I will <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H7237>Rabbah<s%> a <S%H5116>stable<s%> for <S%H1581>camels,<s%> and the <S%H1121>Ammonites<s%> <S%H5984><s%> a couching <S%H4769>place<s%> for <S%H6629>flocks:<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H3282>Because<s%> you have <S%H4222>clapped<s%> your <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and <S%H7554>stamped<s%> with the <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and <S%H8055>rejoiced<s%> in <S%H5315>heart<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H7589>despite<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%>

<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> <S%H3651>therefore<s%> I will <S%H5186>stretch<s%> out my <S%H3027>hand<s%> on you, and will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> you for a <S%H957>spoil<s%> to the <S%H1471>heathen;<s%> and I will <S%H3772>cut<s%> you off from the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and I will cause you to <S%H6>perish<s%> out of the <S%H776>countries:<s%> I will <S%H8045>destroy<s%> you; and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H3282>Because<s%> that <S%H4124>Moab<s%> and <S%H8165>Seir<s%> do <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> is like to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen;<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore,<s%> <S%H2005>behold,<s%> I will <S%H6605>open<s%> the <S%H3802>side<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> from the <S%H5892>cities,<s%> from his <S%H5892>cities<s%> which are on his <S%H7097>frontiers,<s%> the <S%H6643>glory<s%> of the <S%H776>country,<s%> <S%H1020>Bethjeshimoth,<s%> <S%H1186>Baalmeon,<s%> and <S%H7156>Kiriathaim,<s%>

To the <S%H1121>men<s%> of the <S%H6924>east<s%> with the <S%H1121>Ammonites,<s%> <S%H5984><s%> and will <S%H5414>give<s%> them in <S%H4181>possession,<s%> that the <S%H1121>Ammonites<s%> <S%H5984><s%> may not be <S%H2142>remembered<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>
And I will <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%> on <S%H4124>Moab;<s%> and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H3282>Because<s%> that <S%H123>Edom<s%> has <S%H6213>dealt<s%> against the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> by taking <S%H5359>vengeance,<s%> and has greatly <S%H816>offended,<s%> and <S%H5358>revenged<s%> himself on them;

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> I will also <S%H5186>stretch<s%> out my <S%H3027>hand<s%> on <S%H123>Edom,<s%> and will <S%H3772>cut<s%> off <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast<s%> from it; and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> it <S%H2723>desolate<s%> from <S%H8487>Teman;<s%> and they of <S%H1719>Dedan<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

And I will <S%H5414>lay<s%> my <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> on <S%H123>Edom<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and they shall <S%H6213>do<s%> in <S%H123>Edom<s%> according to my <S%H639>anger<s%> and according to my <S%H2534>fury;<s%> and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H5360>vengeance,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H3282>Because<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> have <S%H6213>dealt<s%> by <S%H5360>revenge,<s%> and have taken <S%H5359>vengeance<s%> with a <S%H7589>despiteful<s%> <S%H5315>heart,<s%> to <S%H4889>destroy<s%> it for the <S%H5769>old<s%> <S%H342>hatred;<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H5186>stretch<s%> out my <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and I will <S%H3772>cut<s%> off the <S%H3774>Cherethims,<s%> and <S%H9>destroy<s%> the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H2348>coast.<s%>

And I will <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> on them with <S%H2534>furious<s%> <S%H8433>rebukes;<s%> and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> when I shall <S%H5414>lay<s%> my <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> on them.
